values: 漫不经心的，茫然地
If someone or something is absent, they are missing or not in the place they are expected to be.
I was absent from school yesterday because I went on a trip with my father.
adj. 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的
vt. 使缺席
a.缺席，不在
